hero.title: We are preparing something exciting & amazing for you!

live.title: Welcome to the event, Stay awhile!
live.lead: Mingle with the students and in the interactive Gathertown hallway track.

newsletter.body: Be the first to know about the event!
newsletter.label: Please enter your email

normalBlock.title: A warm welcome to our beautifully amazing teachers on this prestigious day!
normalBlock.description:
It would be our greatest pleasure to cheerfully invite all of our spectacular teachers to a specially organised event by the students!


We, the students of 21K prepared a teacher’s day celebration program in your wonderful honor. Your presence will light up the occasion greatly


We are looking forward to this event as we are planning something very special because you are special and our school life is incomplete without you. It’s your day to shine! and our day to say - Thank you!

highlightedBlock.title: Event Details
bulletPoints: Dance, Skits and a lot more!
highlightedBlock.description: So, Yeah! We're excited to show you what we have prepared for you our dear Teachers!

followEvent.title: Follow the event
followEvent.lead: A great event to celebrate teachers for what they are!
followEvent.description: During the event we'll be hosting a virtual hallway experience in Gather. Jump in to explore and to talk with those standing closest to you, focusing on smaller or personal conversations.
